## Daily Closing Prices of Major European Stock Indices, 1991â€“1998

### Description

Contains the daily closing prices of major European stock indices: Germany DAX (Ibis), Switzerland SMI, France CAC, and UK FTSE. The data are sampled in business time, i.e., weekends and holidays are omitted.

### Visualization:

```{r}
plot(EuStockMarkets, plot.type = "single",
     main = "European Stock Indices",
     xlab = "Year",
     ylab = "Index Value",
     yaxt = "n",
     las = 1, 
     col  = c("blue", "red", "green", "purple"))
legend("topleft",
       legend = colnames(EuStockMarkets),
       col = c("blue", "red", "green", "purple"),
       lty = 1, bty = "n", cex = 0.8)
# Add a custom y-axis with more ticks
axis(side = 2,
     at = pretty(range(EuStockMarkets), n = 15),
     las = 1)

```
